The Origin of the Doodle
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): The Origin of the Doodle
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, October 23, 2003 - 07:52 am:

I was recently researching some of Tecmo's older arcade games, and ran across a soundtrack for a 1995 title "Ganbare Ginkun". The CD had Doodles on the cover of and throughout the booklet, some with spears, some with glasses, etc. Anyway, it appears that this game-show style arcade game was their very first appearance, and while I have never seen an actual machine, I have seen enough evidence to be convncing. Here's a link to pictures at The Video Game Museum but beware of popups, especially ones asking if it's ok for something to download onto your computer (say no to that).
